hopobject.name: Page
hopobject.body: One moment, please ukhotjocks.com Zac Efron managed to combine work and charity recently while filming 'The Lucky One' in New Orleans. The actor, who is portraying a Marine in the movie adaptation of the Nicholas Sparks book, had to lose his famous locks for the part, which called for a buzz cut in some scenes. The act inspired Efron to convince the film's crew to cut their hair, as well, all in the name of charitable sacrifice, the Times-Picayune reported.Efron, 23, pledged to donate money to Kingsley House, a New Orleans-based organization that serves local families, for every staffer that trimmed his or her head.
